final_answer:
The humor in the image comes from the play on words and the unexpected twist. In the left panel labeled "YES," two people are happily interacting with a cat labeled "Blue Cat," suggesting everything is fine and normal.

In the right panel labeled "BUT," the situation takes a humorous turn. A person is surprised as a cat labeled "Russian Blue Cat" is dramatically escaping from a box. The label "Russian Blue Cat" is a play on the actual breed of a cat, which is known for its gray-blue color. The joke lies in the juxtaposition of the literal interpretation of "Blue Cat" on the left and the exaggerated chaos caused by the "Russian Blue Cat" on the right. This unexpected scenario creates a humorous contrast.
